[BorgBase](https://www.borgbase.com) makes offsite backups with Borg Backup simple and painless.

**Main features:**
- All your backups, space usage, recent activity in a single dashboard
- Everything encrypted, only you control the key
- Append-Only mode prevents any changes to existing backups
- Minimal upload and space usage, everything is compressed and deduplicated client-side
- Monitoring: get notified of broken or missing backups
- [API](https://github.com/borgbase/borgbase-api-client) and [Ansible role](https://github.com/borgbase/ansible-role-borgbackup) to #AutomateAllTheThings
- [GUI client for desktops](https://github.com/borgbase/vorta) available (Python and soon Golang)

![](https://www.borgbase.com/static/screenshots/repos-5.jpg)

**After doubling the previous coupon quota, there are still a few redemptions left if you are looking to lock in a low price for backups for the next year.**

**Pricing:** (before discount)
- Small plan, $25/year: 100GB and 10 repos, $.01/GB/month thereafter.
- Medium plan, $80/year: 1TB and unlimited repos $.005/GB/month thereafter
- Large plan, $15/month or $150/year: 2TB and unlimited repos, $.005/GB/month thereafter

Custom plans or private deployments: [get in touch](https://www.lowendtalk.com/messages/add/m4nu)
